title.rendered: AUS vs NZ 2nd ODI Pitch Report

content.rendered:
1st innings average score: 161

2nd innings average score: 162

Type: Batting is relatively less challenging in the first innings. Swing for pacers in the second innings, that is, when the sun goes down.

Cazalys Stadium ODI Stats

  • Total ODI matches played at the stadium: 3
  • Batting 1st Won: 0
  • Batting 2nd Won: 3
  • Avg. Score in 1st innining: 161
  • Highest Score: 233/8(Aus against NZ on 6 Sep 2022 )
